Eldritch Eye.benefit: Gain a third eye with magic powers.

Eldritch Heritage, Greater.benefit: Gain a higher-level sorcerer bloodline power.

Elemental Channel.benefit: Channel energy can harm or heal elementals.

Elemental Conversion.benefit: You can infuse your elemental spells with primal magic.

Elemental Focus.benefit: +1 bonus on save DCs for one energy type.

Elemental Focus, Greater.benefit: +1 bonus on save DCs for one energy type.

Elongated Cranium.benefit: Gain bonuses and penalties based on head shape

Emotional Conduit.benefit: Gain new spells tied to phantom’s emotional focus

prerequisites.Special: Psychic Sensitivity or ability to cast psychic spells

Empath.benefit: Read emotions quickly and often, but open your mind to risk

Endurance.benefit: +4 bonus on checks to avoid nonlethal damage.

Energized Wild Shape.benefit: One natural attack while wild shaped deals +1d6 points of energy damage; gain energy resistance 10 (choose between acid, cold, electricity, or fire)

Exotic Heritage.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on skill checks with a skill of your choice, and adjust prerequisites for the Eldritch Heritage feat

Expert Cartographer.benefit: Gain a +4 bonus on Craft (maps) checks, and enhanced results when using discovery system

Expert Explorer.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on skill checks when using discovery rules

Expert Salvager.benefit: Gain a +4 bonus on Craft checks for certain actions while foraging or salvaging

Extended Aspects.benefit: Add Wisdom bonus to minutes usable per day for your shifter aspect ability to assume a minor form

prerequisites.Special: Survived being tortured 10 or more times

Endure Pain.benefit: May make a saving throw to reduce nonlethal damage.

Energy Channel.benefit: Spend channel energy to deal extra energy damage with weapon attacks.

Esoteric Linguistics.benefit: Use Linguistics in place of some Use Magic Device and Spellcraft checks.

Eternal Enmity.benefit: Deal +1d6 precision damage against hated foes

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast summon monster I

Evolved Summoned Monster.benefit: Summoned monster gains a 1-point eidolon evolution.

Exorcising Mutilation.benefit: Grievously damage yourself to fight off a dominate effect or possession

Exorcist.benefit: You can stagger incorporeal and possessed creatures through sheer force of will.

Expanded Arcana.benefit: Add one or two spells to list of spells known.

Expanded Metakinesis.benefit: Select one of the following metamagic feats: Disruptive Spell, Ectoplasmic Spell, Furious Spell, Merciful Spell, or Piercing Spell. By accepting 1 point of burn, you can alter your kinetic blast as if using the selected metamagic feat.

prerequisites.Special: Ability to cast a summon monster spell

Expanded Summon Monster.benefit: You add additional monsters to your list of summonable options.

prerequisites.Special: Ability to use ranger traps or land mines

Expansive Trap Ability.benefit: Your ranger traps and land mines have a larger area of effect.

prerequisites.Special: inspiration or lore master class feature

Expeditious Sleuth.benefit: Search faster and gain a +2 bonus when you take 20

Experienced Vagabond.benefit: Bonus when dealing with criminals and unsavory characters.

Exploit Lore.benefit: Use your lore to gain attack and damage bonus against a single creature.

Exquisite Sneak.benefit: Use Stealth without penalty from most armor

Extend Resonant Power.benefit: Share resonant powers with an ally

Extended Animal Focus.benefit: Add your Wisdom modifier to the number of minutes per day you can use animal focus.

Extended Bane.benefit: Bane is extended a number of rounds equal to your Wisdom.

prerequisites.Special: Ability to cast a spell of the scrying subschool

Extended Scrying.benefit: Any scrying spell you cast lasts twice as long as normal, as if it were cast as an extended spell with the Extend Spell metamagic feat. Additionally, when you cast a scrying spell with a casting time of 10 minutes or longer, that casting time is halved.

Extended Stare.benefit: Increase hypnotic stare’s range by 10 feet

Extra Bane.benefit: May use bane ability 3 additional times per day.

Extra Bombs.benefit: Throw two additional bombs per day.

prerequisites.Special: Ability to cast cantrips or orisons

Extra Cantrips or Orisons.benefit: Gain 2 additional cantrips or orisons known.

Extra Channel.benefit: Channel energy two additional times per day.

Extra Discovery.benefit: You gain one additional discovery. You must meet all of the prerequisites for this discovery.

Extra Evolution.benefit: Eidolon adds 1 point to its evolution pool.

Extra Gnome Magic.benefit: Gain more uses of your gnome spell-like abilities.

prerequisites.Special: Amateur Investigator or inspiration class feature

Extra Ki.benefit: Increase your ki pool by 2 points.

Extra Lay On Hands.benefit: Use lay on hands two additional times per day.

Extra Martial Flexibility.benefit: Gain three uses of martial flexibility.

Extra Mental Focus.benefit: Gain 2 additional points of mental focus

Extra Mercy.benefit: Your lay on hands benefits from one additional mercy.

Extra Mesmerist Tricks.benefit: Implant two additional tricks per day

prerequisites.Special: Amateur Swashbuckler or panache class feature

Extra Performance.benefit: Use bardic performance for 6 additional rounds per day.

Extra Rage.benefit: Use rage for 6 additional rounds per day.

Extra Ranger Trap.benefit: Set traps two additional times a day.

Extra Reservoir.benefit: Gain 3 more points in your arcane reservoir.

prerequisites.Special: Ability to cast summon monster as a spell-like ability

Extra Summons.benefit: Gain 1 extra use of summon monster per day.

Extra Touch Treatment.benefit: Use touch treatment two additional times per day

Special: Channeling Variance or variant channeling ability

Extra Variance.benefit: You gain one additional variant channeling ability that matches one of your deity’s domains, subdomains, or areas of concern. Three times per day, you can apply the modifications of this variant channel energy, reducing the damage dealt or healing performed by your channeled energy as normal. You cannot apply more than one variant channeling ability to your channeled energy at once.

Extra Wild Talent.benefit: Gain a wild talent at least 2 spell levels lower than maximum

Extraplanar Conjunction.benefit: Increase the save DC of a racial spell-like ability by 2 when near an ally with this feat and the same spell-like ability

Eyes of Judgment.benefit: Determine target’s exact alignment after 3 rounds of observation.

Eyes of the Twilight.benefit: Creatures in dim light don’t gain concealment from you

Falconry Master.benefit: Bonuses when dealing with birds of prey.

False Trail.benefit: Create false trail in the wild to deceive creatures tracking you

Familiar Bond.benefit: You gain a familiar, as the wizard arcane bond class feature. You do not gain the special ability the familiar normally grants its master, and the familiar does not gain the deliver touch spells, scry on familiar, share spells, speak with animals of its kind, or spell resistance special abilities. Otherwise, your total HD are used as your wizard level for determining the familiar’s abilities.

Improved Familiar Bond.benefit: Your familiar gains all the normal abilities available to a familiar of a wizard with a level equal to your total HD. You also gain the special ability normally gained by a master of your type of familiar.

Far-Roaming Familiar.benefit: You retain your empathic link to your familiar regardless of distance, though lead blocks the link at distances greater than 1 mile (similar to the way lead blocks detect magic effects).

Famine Tolerance.benefit: Go for longer periods between feedings without taking penalties.

Fascination Jinx.benefit: A creature you jinx that is fascinated by a bard’s fascinate ability takes a –10 penalty on initiative checks while affected by the jinx. A creature under the effect of your fascinate ability has a –2 penalty on its save against your jinx.

Fast Crawl.benefit: Move at half speed while prone.

Fast Empathy.benefit: Use wild empathy as a standard action.

Fast Healer.benefit: Regain additional hit points when healing.

Favored Defense.benefit: Bonus to CMD and AC when attacked by favored enemy.

Favored Enemy Spellcasting.benefit: Spell DCs are 1 higher for your chosen enemy.

Favored Judgment.benefit: Judgments have greater effect on creatures of a specific type, chosen from the ranger’s favored enemy list.

Fear Eater.benefit: Transfer others’ fear effects to yourself

Fearless Aura.benefit: Aura of courage expands and makes allies immune to fear effects.

Fearsome Finish.benefit: Gain a bonus on Intimidate checks when you reduce an enemy to 0 or fewer hit points.

Feign Curse.benefit: Trick an enemy into thinking she’s cursed

Ferocious Horde.benefit: Gain +2 morale bonus on attack rolls when you and an ally with this feat are both at or below half hit points

Fey Foundling.benefit: Magical healing works better on you.

Fey-Guarded.benefit: Gain a +2 morale bonus against enchantment and illusion effects from fey

Fey Insight.benefit: Gain +2 bonus on Bluff, Diplomacy, and Sense Motive checks when interacting with fey

Fey Spell Lore.benefit: Add fey-themed spells to your druid spell list

Fey Spell Versatility.benefit: Add enchantments, illusions, or curses to your ranger spell list

Field Repair.benefit: Take no penalty for repairs made with improvised materials.

Fiendish Darkness.benefit: You can use darkness three times per day as a spell-like ability.

Fiendish Darkness, Improved.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus to your effective CL when using your darkness spell-like ability. In addition, whenever you cast a spell with the [evil] descriptor that targets another creature, you can spend a swift action to apply the effects of your darkness spell-like ability to the spell cast, with the darkness effect centered on the spell’s target. Using the darkness spell-like ability in this way expends all three uses of it for the day, and it cannot be used if fewer than three uses of it remain for that day.

Fiendish Facade.benefit: Gain different ability modifiers from being tied to a specific race of fiends.

Fiendish Heritage.benefit: Choose different racial abilities from normal for Tiefling.

Fiendish Resilience.benefit: Choose one of the following energy types that you have resistance to: cold, electricity, or fire. Anytime you make a Reflex saving throw against an attack that deals the selected type of energy damage and is subject to your evasion class feature, you gain a +4 competence bonus on the save.

Fiendish Sorcery, Improved.benefit: If you are a sorcerer and possess the Rakshasa bloodline or Shadow bloodline, treat your Charisma score as 2 points higher for all sorcerer class abilities.

Fight On.benefit: Gain temporary hit points when reduced to 0.

Fire God’s Blessing.benefit: Heal hit points when dealing fire damage to the enemy.

Special: ability to cast at least one arcane fire spell from another class

Fire Music.benefit: Replace bard spell damage with fire damage, summoned monsters gain fire attacks.

Fleet.benefit: Your base speed increases by 5 feet.

prerequisites.Special: Sneak attack +3d6, bleeding sneak attack rogue trick or bleed universal monster ability

Flensing Strike.benefit: When you successfully inflict sneak attack damage on a foe with a slashing weapon, your attack doesn’t go particularly deep, but you do carve away a significant portion of skin and flesh. If this sneak attack inflicts bleed damage, the victim of the sneak attack is sickened by the pain and has its natural armor bonus (if any) reduced by a number of points equal to the number of sneak attack dice you possess. These penalties persist as long as the bleed damage persists. Multiple strikes on the same foe do not stack the bleed damage, but the penalty to natural armor does stack, to a maximum penalty equal to the target’s normal full natural armor score.

Flexible Hex.benefit: Change wandering hex with a swift action.

Flexible Shadow Jump.benefit: When you travel between shadows using the shadow jump ability, the minimum increment that you can jump is 5 feet, allowing you to split your shadow jumps into 5-foot increments instead of 10-foot increments. In addition, your shadow jump ability counts as the ability to cast dimension door for the purpose of meeting the prerequisites of the Dimensional Agility feat as well as any feat that lists that feat as a prerequisite.

Flow of Elements.benefit: Change all or part of a spell’s damage to the energy type associated with the race of an adjacent ally who has this feat

Focused Disbelief.benefit: You gain SR equal to 11 + your character level vs. spells and spell-like abilities described by the Divine Defiance feat. You can lower this resistance for 1 round as a standard action.

Focused Eidolon.benefit: Gain +4 on concentration checks while adjacent to your eidolon.

Focused Inspiration.benefit: Roll d8s or higher when you use inspiration on chosen skills.

Focused Phantom.benefit: Gain +4 on concentration checks while phantom is adjacent or within your consciousness.

Fool Magic.benefit: Use Disguise to fool magic items

Special: ability to cast at least one arcane force spell

Force Dash.benefit: Lose a prepared spell or a spell slot to increase your speed.

Foebane Magic.benefit: Favored enemies take a penalty against your spells. (Class feature Forester Favored terrain (forest) class feature ignores difficult terrain from undergrowth and uses trees to protect from attacks.)

Formula Recollection.benefit: When a spell is cast, record its formula later.

Fortune Teller.benefit: Cast some divination spells at +1 CL.

Fox Shape.benefit: You can shapechange to a fox. Your bite attack’s damage is reduced to 1d3 but you gain a +10 racial bonus on Disguise checks made to appear as a fox.

Free Spirit.benefit: +2 bonus on saves vs. mind-affecting and on escape attempts.

Friendly Switch.benefit: Switch places with an ally as part of a 5-foot-step.

Frightful Shape.benefit: Your wild shape form is supernaturally fearsome and can frighten observers.

Furious Finish.benefit: Deal maximum damage and end your rage.

Galley Slave.benefit: +2 bonus to Profession (sailor) checks and +2 damage bonus to first hit on ship.

prerequisites.Special: bold stare and mesmerist tricks class features

Gaze Reflection.benefit: Use your stare to ignore or reflect gaze attacks

Gliding Steps.benefit: Use ki to provoke fewer attacks of opportunities while moving.

Glorious Heat.benefit: When you cast a divine spell with the [fire] descriptor you heal an ally within 30 ft. half your level in hp and grant the ally +1 morale bonus to attacks until end of its turn.

Gnome Trickster.benefit: Use mage hand and prestidigitation once per day.

Go Unnoticed.benefit: Make Stealth check against flat-footed opponents during first round of combat.

Grant Initiative.benefit: Grant bonus to initiative to ally.

Grappled Caster.benefit: You gain a +4 bonus on concentration checks to cast spells while grappled. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Combat Casting.

Grasping Tail.benefit: Use your tail to grab small stowed objects as a swift action

Lashing Tail.benefit: Gain a tail slap natural attack

Mischievous Tail.benefit: Your tail functions as a free hand and gains a +2 bonus on disarm and steal combat maneuvers and on Sleight of Hand checks

Gravitational Vital Strike.benefit: Deal additional damage in heavy or light gravity

Gravity Acclimation*.benefit: Ignore penalties for being on heavy gravity planes and increase carrying capacity

Great Fortitude, Improved.benefit: Once per day, you may reroll a Fortitude save.

Greater Channel Smite.benefit: Can exchange channel positive energy to create pool of damage dice.

Greater Mercy.benefit: Lay on hands heals extra hit points if the target doesn’t need a mercy.

Green Faith Acolyte.benefit: Your spells work more efficiently on plants.

Groundling.benefit: Speak with burrowing animals as spell-like ability.

prerequisites.Special: have a familiar with the share spells and deliver touch spells abilities

Group Deliver Touch Spells.benefit: You and any allies with this feat can cast spells through one another’s familiars as though each ally had the share spells ability with each other familiar. This feat otherwise functions as the share spells ability.

prerequisites.Special: Have a familiar with the share spells ability

Group Shared Spells.benefit: You and any allies with this feat can cast spells with a target of “you” on each other’s familiars as touch spells. Both the target familiar and that familiar’s master must be willing for the spell to take effect. You can cast spells on each other’s familiars even if the spells would not normally affect creatures of the targeted familiar’s type.

Guided Hand.benefit: May use Wisdom modifier for attack rolls with favored weapon.

Guild Partner.benefit: Whenever you are in a settlement that is the size of small town or larger, you can purchase (but not sell) items through your contacts.

Gunslinger.benefit: When you attack with a firearm, you do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

Gunsmithing.benefit: May create, repair, and restore firearms.

Hand’s Autonomy.benefit: Your possessed hand can act independently.

Hand’s Detachment.benefit: Your possessed hand can painlessly pull free of your body or reattach itself, leaving you with a bloodless but raw-looking stump at the end of one arm while the hand itself performs remote tasks under your command, acting in many ways like a strange familiar

Hand’s Knowledge.benefit: The connection to the memories of the spirit possessing your hand deepens.

Hand’s Sight.benefit: While your possessed hand isn’t carrying anything, you gain darkvision with a range of 60 feet and cannot be flanked.

Harmonic Sage.benefit: Gain extra abilities when performing within an artificial structure.

Harmonic Spell.benefit: Casting spells extends duration of your bardic performance.

Harrowed.benefit: +1 on saves vs. enchantment; can draw Harrow cards for bonuses.

Harrowed Summoning.benefit: When you cast a conjuration (summoning) spell or use a spell-like ability to summon one or more creatures, you can draw two random cards from a complete harrow deck you own.

Haruspicy.benefit: If you perform a successful coup de grace, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on skill checks attempted as part of a single occult ritual or occult skill unlock performed within the next minute.

prerequisites.Special: allegiance to a Hell Knight order

Hell Knight Aegis.benefit: Once per day as a full-round action, you can give your armor the broken condition.

prerequisites.Special: allegiance to a Hell Knight order

Hell Knight Obedience.benefit: Upon taking this feat, you gain proficiency in all of your order’s favored weapons. Additionally, by meditating and inflicting strenuous reckonings upon yourself, you unlock the power behind your order’s doctrine.

prerequisites.Special: allegiance to a Hell Knight order

Hell Knight Obsession.benefit: During your hour-long reckoning, if you choose to deal lethal damage to yourself, you reach a state of fantastic focus.

Hellcat Stealth.benefit: You may make Stealth checks in normal or bright light even when observed, but at a -10 penalty.

Hermean Blood.benefit: 2 skills of your choice are class skills.

Hero’s Fortune.benefit: You gain a hero point. The maximum number of hero points you can have at any one time is increased to 5.

Heroic Defiance.benefit: Once per day, delay onset of harmful condition for 1 round.

Heroic Recovery.benefit: Once per day, gain new saving throw against harmful condition requiring Fort save.

Hidden Presence.benefit: Abjurations and divinations treat you as the greater possession possessed creature

Hide Worker.benefit: Gain a +4 bonus on Craft (armor) checks when 3 ranks working with hides, can sometimes craft items at discount

Intrusive Presence.benefit: Read the mind of a possessed creature

Hide-Out.benefit: Anyone attempting to locate or scry upon you finds it more difficult.

High Magic Focus.benefit: Spontaneously apply metamagic feats without using higher-level spell slots or increasing casting time if allies ready an action to cast the same spell

Hindrance Dismissal.benefit: You can dismiss any pit spell (such as create pit, hungry pit, spiked pit, and similar spells with ‘pit’ in their names) or wall spell (such as wall of fire, wall of ice, and similar spells with ‘wall’ in their names) you cast. The spells must have a duration of at least 1 round. This ability follows the normal rules for dismissing spells, allowing you to dismiss conjured pits and walls as a standard action.

Hymn Singer.benefit: Your bardic performances keep vampires at bay.

Ice Climber.benefit: Gain bonuses to climb on or move across slippery surfaces and to notice and avoid avalanches

Imperial Knight.benefit: Gain a cohort (see Leadership); cohort is human or halfling commoner, expert, or warrior with Squire feat. When within 10 ft. of squire, get +2 bonus on init checks and +1 dodge bonus to AC.

Imperial Squire.benefit: When within 50 ft. of a mounted ally with the Mounted Combat feat, gain +2 bonus on init. If ally is injured, gain +1 dodge bonus on AC as long as you are within 10 ft. of him.

Implant Bomb.benefit: Implant a bomb in a willing or helpless creature.

Implement Focus.benefit: Use generic focus efficiently with an implement

prerequisites.Special: ability to perform dirge of doom

Improved Dirge of Doom.benefit: Dirge of doom expands to 60 feet and can cause fear up to frightened.

prerequisites.Special: ability to perform dirge of doom

Greater Dirge of Doom.benefit: Your dirge effects linger and can cause fear up to panicked.

Improved Duck and Cover.benefit: When you use Duck and Cover, an ally with evasion or improved evasion takes some of the damage.

Improved Plane Shift.benefit: Learn plane shift as a 5th-level spell and identify planes more easily

Improvisational Healer.benefit: When attempting a Heal check that normally requires a healer’s kit, you don’t take a penalty on the check for not having a healer’s kit. When you use a healer’s kit, you can augment it with improvised supplies, gaining an additional +2 circumstance bonus on your check. Finally, you can treat any potion of cure light wounds, potion of cure moderate wounds, or potion of cure serious wounds you drink yourself or administer to another character as though its caster level were equal to the number of ranks you have in the Heal skill. The spell’s normal limitations apply; for example, a potion of cure light wounds can cure a maximum of 1d8+5 points of damage, even if you have more than 5 ranks in the Heal skill.

prerequisites.Special: ability to acquire an animal companion, eidolon, familiar, or special mount

Improved Spell Sharing.benefit: Divide spell duration with the companion creature.

Incorporeal Intuition.benefit: Notice adjacent incorporeal creatures inside walls

prerequisites.Special: ability to cause disease with a natural weapon via an extraordinary or supernatural ability

Infectious Weapons.benefit: Creatures damaged by your ranged and melee weapon attacks have a chance to contract disease, as though they were damaged with your disease-spreading natural weapon.

Inner Light.benefit: Whenever you cast your daylight spell-like ability, you do so as if your CL were one higher. Whenever an enemy successfully counters or dispels your daylight spell-like ability, you and any allies within a 20-foot radius gain darkvision 60 feet for a number of rounds equal to your character level. This is a supernatural effect.

Insightful Delivery.benefit: Increase the DC of poison delivered with studied strike.

Insightful Gaze.benefit: When using Sense Motive, roll twice and take the higher roll.

Inspired Alchemy.benefit: Spend time and inspiration to recreate a consumed extract.

prerequisites.Special: ability to perform dirge of doom

Inspired by Fear.benefit: You and allies in your dirge of doom effect gain a +4 bonus against fear.

Inspired Strike.benefit: Expend inspiration to increase the damage dealt with the studied combat.

Inspiring Mentor.benefit: Inspire competence affects allies within 30 feet

Inspiring Talent.benefit: Share benefits of an ally’s Skill Focus or weapon proficiencies in certain situations

Instant Judgment.benefit: May pronounce or change a judgment as an immediate action.

Intimidating Bane.benefit: Gain +2 bonus on Dazzling Display while bane is active.

Intimidating Gaze.benefit: When using Intimidate, roll twice and take the higher roll.

Intimidating Glance.benefit: Demoralize hypnotic stare target as a swift action

Special: ability to start performances or raging song as move action
bardic performance or raging song class feature

Intimidating Performance.benefit: Demoralize foes with a successful Perform check.

Intoxicating Flattery.benefit: Flatter someone to weaken Wisdom-based checks

Invoke Primal Instinct.benefit: Expend one use of wild shape, and make a Bluff check to cause all creatures within 30 ft. that fail a Will save to regard you as a figure of either fear or contempt.

Ironguts.benefit: +2 on saves against nausea, sickening, and ingested poisons.

Iron Will, Improved.benefit: Once per day, you may reroll a Will save.

Jinx Alchemy.benefit: A creature suffering from one of your jinxes cannot benefit from the effects of potions, elixirs, or any other substance that he must ingest in order to activate.

Judgment Surge1.benefit: Gain improved versions of your judgments.

Juju Way.benefit: Cast touch spells at a range of 20 feet when targeting a willing ally who has this feat.

Jungle Survivalist.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on saves against diseases, poisons, and distraction from swarms; Acrobatics and Climb checks in trees; and on Perception checks against certain creatures that are hiding in vegetation.

Smell Fear.benefit: +4 on Perception checks to detect frightened creatures.

Keif Euphoria.benefit: Gain a bonus to your Willpower while under the effects of drug.

Keif Magic.benefit: You can easily recognize all forms of keif, including tainted or false forms, and gain a +5 competence bonus to Appraise checks made to determine the value of keif or realize that a substance is not the real thing. You gain a +1 bonus on Fortitude saving throws and a +2 bonus on saving throws against poison. This feat counts as the Endurance feat for the purpose of qualifying for the Diehard feat.

Keif Rejuvenation.benefit: Stave off the effects of death while using a particular kind of drug.

Ki Stand.benefit: Stand up as a swift action, and spend 1 ki point to not provoke attacks of opportunity when you do so.

Kinetic Counter.benefit: Use kinetic blast to counter an opposing element kinetic blast class feature.

Kinetic Leap.benefit: Use blast to add +10 on Acrobatics checks to jump (+20 at 10 ranks)

Kinslayer.benefit: Deal +1d6 precision damage against creatures of your type and subtype.

Knockout Artist.benefit: Gain +1 damage per sneak attack when dealing nonlethal sneak damage.

Lay of the Land.benefit: Gain lesser version of favored terrain class feature.

prerequisites.Special: membership in the same organization as cohort

Practiced Leadership.benefit: As long as you and your cohort maintain membership in good standing within the same organization, your cohort gains a +4 morale bonus on Will saves against enchantment spells and effects. Additionally, your cohort is treated as though she possessed the same teamwork feats you do for the purpose of determining whether you receive a bonus from your teamwork feats. Your cohort doesn’t receive any bonuses from these feats unless she actually possesses the feats. If you and your cohort belong to one of the organizations listed in this section, your cohort gains the practiced leadership benefit associated with your organization. If a benefit grants your cohort access to a spell-like ability, the CL of the effect is 1st or equal to your cohort’s CL, whichever is higher.

Leaf Singer.benefit: Gain benefits to bardic performance in forests and against fey.

Legendary Influence.benefit: Gain a different feat from each legend

Improved Legendary Influence.benefit: Gain two different feats from each legend

Letter Fury.benefit: If someone reads or writes in your presence you may activate your rage ability for one round for free.

Lie Low.benefit: If you have been prone since the end of your last turn, the penalty on Perception checks for others to notice you increases by 1 for every 20 feet between you and the observer, to a maximum increase of 5 at 100 feet.

Life-Dominant Soul.benefit: Both positive and negative energy heal you.

Life Lure.benefit: Channel positive energy to fascinate undead.

Lifeless Gaze.benefit: Gain bonuses against emotions, and those who read your mind or fail to impress you gain the shaken condition

Light Gravity Acclimation.benefit: You are faster and harder to hit on light gravity planes, and you gain +2 on Acrobatics checks

Lightning Reflexes, Improved.benefit: Once per day, you may reroll a Reflex save.

Light Step.benefit: Move normal speed in difficult terrain.

Lingering Performance.benefit: Bardic performance continues for 2 rounds after you stop performing.

Live Off the Land.benefit: Move at full speed and gain a +4 bonus on Survival checks when using Survival to gather food

Living Fortress.benefit: Racial bonus on saves against spells and spell-like abilities increases by 2 when you’re adjacent to an ally who has this feat

Loyal to the Death.benefit: You can become the target of an attack directed against an adjacent ally who has this feat

Luck of Heroes.benefit: Hero point might not be spent when you use one to reroll or grant yourself a bonus.

Lucky Halfling.benefit: You may roll saving throw for an ally once per day.

Lunging Spell Touch.benefit: Increase reach of spell’s touch attack by 5 feet.

Mage’s Tattoo.benefit: Select a school of magic (other than divination) in which you have Spell Focus —you cast spells from this school at +1 CL and gain one spell-like ability usable up to three times per day.

Magical Aptitude.benefit: +2 bonus on Spellcraft and Use Magic Device checks.

Malicious Eye.benefit: When a creature fails a save against your evil eye hex, add the effect of your jinx to the effect of the hex.

Manifested Blood.benefit: Surround yourself with an element associated with your bloodline to gain resistance against its energy and deal damage to attackers.

Manipulative Agility.benefit: Use Sleight Of Hand for body-language Bluffs.

Master Alchemist.benefit: +2 on Craft (alchemy) checks, and you can create alchemical items and poisons faster.

Master Craftsman.benefit: You can Craft magic items without being a spellcaster.

Master of Wonders.benefit: When you activate a rod of wonder, roll d% to determine what effect the rod would create. If you desire to do so, you can roll d% again and use this second result. You can only use this ability once per round.

Maximized Spellstrike.benefit: Maximize spellstrike by spending 3 arcana pool points.

Measure Foe.benefit: Measure a foe’s combat prowess and gain bonuses.

Menacing Bane.benefit: May imbue weapon with menacing special quality.

Merciful Bane.benefit: Switch damage from lethal to nonlethal as a swift action.

Merciless Rush.benefit: If your bull rush exceeds the target's CMD by 5, move through the opponent and cause trample damage.

Mercenary Company Tattoos.benefit: You can Intimidate creatures able to see your tattoos, even when stress or distractions would normally prevent you from doing so.

Mesmerizing Feint.benefit: Lower penalties for feinting against creatures of other types.

Greater Mesmerizing Feint.benefit: Feint against mindless creatures with bold stare effects.

Minotaur’s Charge.benefit: When you hit an opponent with a charge attack, you might also initiate a bull rush as a free action. This does not require you to move into your opponent’s square and does not provoke an attack of opportunity. If you successfully push your opponent 15 feet or more, he is also knocked prone.

Mirror Kin.benefit: You become difficult to distinguish from your allies, giving you a 20% miss chance due to concealment.

Misdirection Redirection.benefit: When using Misdirection Tactics, redirect the attack to another creature.

Monster Lore, Improved.benefit: Gain a sacred bonus on monster lore checks.

prerequisites.Special: functions as the druid animal companion ability with an effective druid level of 7

Monstrous Companion.benefit: You can select a magical beast as a cohort in place of your animal companion class feature. (Effective Cohort Level is determined by your effective druid level.)

Monstrous Mask.benefit: You get a +5 racial bonus on Intimidate checks made against all creatures of the humanoid type.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast summon nature’s ally

Moonlight Summons.benefit: Summoned creatures are immune to confusion and sleep effects, and their natural weapons are treated as silver.

Moontouched.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on Fortitude and Reflex saves but take a –2 penalty on Will saves at night when the moon is at least partially showing.

Mountaineer.benefit: Gain +2 on Climb checks and +4 on saves to avoid high altitude effects; you acclimate to altitudes more quickly.

Mounted Blade.benefit: When you use the Ride-by Attack feat, if your attack hits, you may also make an attack against a target adjacent to your original target. This additional attack has a -5 penalty to the attack roll. You may use this feat whether riding a mount or using a flying item such as a broom of flying or carpet of flying.

Mutated Shape.benefit: Grow an additional limb to make a natural attack class feature in wild shape form.

Mutilating Ritualist.benefit: Mutilate yourself to enhance a ritual (see text), and gain Spellcraft 4 ranks.

Sacrificial Ritualist.benefit: Kill sentient creatures to enhance your ritual.

Mystic Stride.benefit: Move at full speed even through magically enhanced foliage.

Natural Poison Harvester.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on Craft (alchemy) checks when creating poisons harvested from creatures; such poisons increase their save DC by +2

Improved Natural Poison Harvester.benefit: Gain 1d4 additional doses of poison when you harvest poison

Natural Poison Antitoxin.benefit: When you create an antitoxin, it has a duration of 4 hours or more

Nature Soul.benefit: You get a +2 bonus on all Knowledge (nature) checks and Survival checks. If you have 10 or more ranks in one of these skills, the bonus increases to +4 for that skill.

Nature’s Freedom.benefit: Allow creatures of your choice the ability to move through dense undergrowth with ease

Nature Magic.benefit: Gain know direction as a constant ability and use one other druid orison once per day.

Necromantic Affinity.benefit: You resist necromantic effects and heal as if undead.

Nerve-Racking Negotiator.benefit: Target of Intimidate doesn’t turn against you later

Special: patron (moon, stars, or winter) class feature

Night Sky Hex.benefit: One of your hex’s save DCs increases by 2 when you are in view of the night sky

Nimble Moves.benefit: Ignore 5 feet of difficult terrain when you move.

Acrobatic Steps.benefit: Ignore 20 feet of difficult terrain when you move.

Nimble Natural Summons.benefit: Movement of creatures you summon via summon nature’s ally is not reduced in undergrowth.

Noble Scion.benefit: +2 on Knowledge (nobility) plus gain a nobility-related boon.

Omnipresent Mentor.benefit: Inspire competence affects one ally for 24 hours

One Eye Open.benefit: The DCs of your Perception checks don’t increase when you sleep

One Mind.benefit: Avoid penalties when flat-footed, blinded, or fighting invisible creatures if you’re adjacent to an ally who has this feat

One with the Land.benefit: You eat and drink half as much, heal naturally faster, and are protected from environmental effects in your favored terrain

Open Conduit.benefit: You can use a conduit feat more often

Oracular Intuition.benefit: Gain bonuses to Sense Motive and Spellcraft to identify magic item properties.

Orator.benefit: Use Linguistics instead of Bluff, Diplomacy, and Intimidate in some instances.

prerequisites.Special: lawful alignment, worship an evil god

Ordered Mind.benefit: Use a different spell than your foe’s when using counterspell.

Overwhelming Phantom.benefit: Three times per day, as a standard action while it is fully manifested, your phantom can attempt to enter and take control of a living creature; doing so provokes an attack of opportunity.

prerequisites.Special: ability to acquire an animal companion

Pack Flanking.benefit: You and your companion creature flank regardless of position.

Painful Anchor.benefit: Deal damage to an anchored evil outsider.

Parry Spell.benefit: Reflect a counterspelled spell back on its caster.

Pass for Human.benefit: +10 on Disguise checks to look like a human.

prerequisites.Special: Magic jar as a known spell or spell-like ability

Penetrating Possesion.benefit: The first time you attempt to possess a host under the effect of protection from evil spell or any similar spell, you have a chance to dispel that spell as if you had cast dispel magic on the spell.

Persuasive.benefit: +2 bonus on Diplomacy and Intimidate checks.

Persuasive Bribery.benefit: Bribe effectively and without offending others.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cause disease via a spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural means

Pestilent.benefit: When you successfully use a spell, spell-like ability, or supernatural ability to cause a creature to contract a disease, you gain a +2 bonus on attack rolls with natural weapons and unarmed strikes against that creature. In addition, such attacks deal an additional 1d6 points of negative energy damage. If you have the supernatural ability to cause a single disease (such as mummy rot), you gain these bonuses against any creature that has contracted the same disease, even if it did not contract it from you.

Phantom Ally.benefit: The abilities of your phantom are calculated as though you were 4 class levels higher, to a maximum effective spiritualist level equal to your character level.

Phantom Fighter.benefit: Phantom’s natural weapon attacks and delivered attacks ability spells have full effect on incorporeal creatures.

Phantom Fortification.benefit: Phantom has a chance to ignore critical hits and flight ability precision-based damage.

Plains Nomad.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on Constitution checks attempted as a result of a forced march; bonus is doubled and applies on other checks in plains terrain.

Planar Heritage.benefit: Gain access to options available to a type of native outsider.

Planar Hunter.benefit: When you are on one of the planes you’ve selected as a favored terrain, you gain a +2 bonus on weapon attack rolls against outsiders native to that plane. You also ignore up to 5 points of damage reduction when making weapon attacks against outsiders native to that plane, except for damage reduction without a type (such as DR 10/—). In addition, you gain this bonus against extraplanar creatures you encounter and identify as being from one of your planar favored terrains, such as with a successful Knowledge (planes) check, regardless of what plane you or they are on.

Planar Preservationist.benefit: With every summon nature’s ally extract you learn, learn a corresponding summon monster extract.

Planar Survivor.benefit: Gain +2 on Survival checks on other planes and +2 on saves against planar hazards.

Planar Wanderer.benefit: Arrive more accurately with plane shift.

Planar Wild Shape.benefit: May add the celestial or fiendish template to your animal form.

Planewalker’s Insight.benefit: Gain +2 on Knowledge (planes) checks and on Sense Motive checks against outsiders; Knowledge (planes) is a class skill for you.

Play to the Crowd.benefit: Learn biases to assist your Diplomacy.

Pommel Strike Deed.benefit: Attack with a light or one-handed piercing weapon’s pommel and knock down foes.

Possessed Hand.benefit: You’ve made a peaceful and permanent bargain with a ghost, spirit, or outsider. It possesses your hand, guiding and aiding you in exchange for help in return.

Potent Holy Symbol.benefit: Your holy symbol keeps vampires at bay when casting spells.

Powerful Shape.benefit: While in wild shape, you are treated as one size category larger.

Practiced Ritualist.benefit: You gain a +2 bonus on skill checks to perform occult rituals, and on Intelligence checks to learn the method of casting an occult ritual. If you are a ritual’s primary caster, the DC for saving throws against the ritual’s effects is 2 higher. If the ritual has a minimum number of required secondary casters, that number is decreased by 1.

Primal Kineticist.benefit: When primal magic surrounds you, you can channel it to transform the nature of your kinetic blasts.

Prodigy.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on two Craft, Perform, or Profession skills.

Profane Studies.benefit: Gain +5 on Knowledge checks and +2 CL on to cast a summon monster spell summoning durations involving evil outsiders.

Prophetic Visionary.benefit: Once per day, enter a deep trance and gain a prophetic vision.

Protector’s Strike.benefit: Grant someone else a deflection bonus to AC while smiting evil instead of yourself.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast conjuration (summoning) spells or a conjuration (summoning) spell-like ability

Proxy Summoning.benefit: Whenever you cast a touch spell while adjacent to a creature you summoned, you can have the summoned creature carry the spell’s charge. Once the spell is cast, you and any creature you summon gain the share spells ability. This feat doesn’t qualify you for feats or other rules options that require you to have an animal companion, familiar, or similar allied creature with the share spells ability.

Psychic Combatant.benefit: Gain free manifestation points in psychic duels or use psychic spell-like abilities.

Psychic Defender.benefit: Gain free temporary hit points when starting a psychic duel.

Psychic Healing.benefit: Use faith healing to treat deadly wounds and grant temporary hit points.

Psychic Maestro.benefit: Use occult skill unlocks more often.

Psychic Sensitivity.benefit: Use occult skill unlocks for trained skills.

Psychic Adept.benefit: Cast a psychic knack 3/day as a spell-like ability.

Psychic Disciple.benefit: Cast a 1st-level psychic spell 2/day as a spell-like ability.

Psychic Virtuoso.benefit: +2 on checks for occult skill unlock (+4 at 10 ranks).

Pure Faith.benefit: Gain a +4 sacred bonus against poison.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast a summon monster or summon nature’s ally spell

Putrid Summons.benefit: Summon a single weaker creature that has a horrific stench.

Quah Bond.benefit: Double benefits granted by your Totem Spirit feat when an ally from the same quah with this feat is within 30 feet

Quick Channel.benefit: Channel energy faster by expending more uses.

Quick Favor.benefit: Follow up quickly on gather information 1/day

Quick Wild Shape.benefit: Wild shape quickly into a less powerful form.

Quicken Blessing.benefit: Choose a blessing and spend two uses to call upon it as a swift action.

Racial Heritage.benefit: Affected as though both human and another race.

Radiant Charge.benefit: Expend uses of lay on hands to deal extra damage, bypassing evil creatures’ resistances and immunities.

Rage Casting.benefit: Sacrifice hit points for bloodrager spell potency.

Raging Absorption.benefit: Absorb arcane energy from damaging spells to refuel bloodrage.

Raging Brutality.benefit: Add Constitution bonus on damage rolls.

Raging Concentration.benefit: While bloodraging, add your morale bonus to Constitution to concentration checks.

Raging Deathblow.benefit: Rend a dying foe and gain one round of rage.

Raging Hurler.benefit: Throw a two-handed weapon as a standard action.

Raging Throw.benefit: Add Con bonus on checks to bull rush.

Raging Vitality.benefit: +2 bonus to Con when raging, and continue raging if unconscious.

Rallying Blow.benefit: When you confirm a critical hit against an enemy, any fear effect affecting allies within 30 feet is reduced by one step. Panicked becomes frightened, frightened becomes shaken, and shaken is removed. In addition, any ally suffering other effects from a failed save against a fear effect, such as the paralysis from a mummy’s despair aura, receives a new save against the effect at the original DC.

Ranged Disable.benefit: Use a ranged weapon for Disable Device.

Ranged Study.benefit: Choose a ranged weapon and use studied combat with that weapon.

Reactive Arcane Shield.benefit: If you are aware of an attack against you that has already been declared and you choose to use the Arcane Shield feat, the immediate action to activate the feat occurs before the attack roll against you is resolved. In addition, all adjacent allies also gain the feat’s deflection bonus to AC for 1 round.

Reactive Healing.benefit: When reduced to 0 hp or fewer, use channel energy or lay on hands to heal yourself as immediate action.

Ready for Battle.benefit: +2 on initiative rolls for allies with implanted tricks.

Ready for Pain.benefit: DR/— against nonlethal damage for allies with implanted tricks.

prerequisites.Special: rage or raging song class feature

Reckless Rage.benefit: Take a penalty on attack rolls to deal more damage while raging.

prerequisites.Special: rage or raging song class feature

Recovered Rage.benefit: Regain rage or raging song with each foe you reduce to 0 or fewer hit points.

Recruits.benefit: You gain a number of cohorts (as the Leadership feat) that represent NPCs you are responsible for instructing and overseeing.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast make whole or mending

Reinforce Crafting.benefit: Your magical creations are hardier than most.

Reject Poison.benefit: Improve your chances against poisons you are familiar with.

Relentless Cheer.benefit: +1 on all saves, increasing to +3 vs. fear, when adjacent to allies who have this feat.

Remote Bomb.benefit: Increase the delay on your bombs and detonate bombs remotely.

Researcher.benefit: In a small town or larger settlement, you can research notes and gain a bonus on a Knowledge check.

Resilient Eidolon.benefit: When you are knocked unconscious, fall asleep, or are killed, your eidolon remains with you.

Respectful Prey.benefit: You have learned to assuage monstrous predators with special offerings.

Revered Guidance.benefit: Select one of the following creature subtypes: dwarf, elf, gnome, halfling, human, or orc. You gain a +4 racial bonus on Diplomacy checks made to influence creatures of the selected subtype.

Reward of Grace.benefit: With each use of lay on hands, gain a +1 sacred bonus on attack rolls.

Reward of Life.benefit: With each use of lay on hands, gain hit points equal to your Charisma.

prerequisites.Special: alignment must match that of your worshiped deity

Reward of the Faithful.benefit: Whenever you are the only target of a divine spell cast by a follower of your chosen deity other than you, the spell’s caster level is treated as though it were 2 higher than it actually is. Additionally, whenever you regain hit points as a result of a worshiper of your deity other than you channeling energy or casting a cure spell, you regain 1 additional hit point per die rolled for the healing gained.

Rhabdomancy.benefit: You can perform the dowsing occult skill unlock even if you can’t use psychic magic. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use dowsing one additional time per day.

Rhetorical Flourish.benefit: Use verbal misdirection while making Diplomacy check.

Ricochet Splash Weapon.benefit: Make an attack roll with a splash weapon if it misses and lands in another creature’s square.

Righteous Healing.benefit: Heal more when you have a judgment active.

Ritual Hex.benefit: You learn to perform a special occult ritual known as Beseeching the Patron, which temporarily grants you a hex you don’t already know how to use.

Robot’s Bane.benefit: Gain offensive and defensive bonuses against robots.

prerequisites.Special: bardic performance or raging song class feature

Rouse Emotions.benefit: You can use Charming Performance on all creatures within 60 feet.

Rugged Northerner.benefit: Treat cold weather conditions as one step less severe.

Run.benefit: Run at 5 times your normal speed.

Sabotage Magic Item.benefit: Sabotage an item to cause a mishap

Sabotage Specialist.benefit: Items you sabotage fail at a more precise time

Sabotaging Sunder, Improved.benefit: Use Sabotaging Sunder on more objects and without provoking attacks of opportunity

Sacred Summons.benefit: Summon monsters whose alignment subtype matches yours as a standard action.

Sacrificial Adept.benefit: Kill sentient creatures to enhance your spells

Scale and Skin.benefit: Whenever a transmutation spell or spell-like ability affects you, your natural armor bonus increases by 1. If you have no natural armor bonus to Armor Class, treat your natural armor bonus as 0 for the purposes of this feat. The bonus increases by 2 if the caster level of the effect is 10th or higher.

Scavenger’s Luck.benefit: When using timeworn technology, roll twice to determine the glitch effect.

Scholar.benefit: Gain a bonus to two Knowledge skills.

Schooled Reserve.benefit: Add your Bravery bonus on saves against vampires.

Scrutinize Spell.benefit: When you witness a creature casting a spell, you can attempt a Spellcraft check to determine what sort of spellcaster the target is—specifically, what the target’s class is.

Sea Legs.benefit: Gain +2 on Acrobatics, Climb, and Swim checks.

Secret Language.benefit: Gain a +5 circumstance bonus on Bluff checks to pass secret messages and communicate a full round’s worth of information as a swift action.

Secret Signs.benefit: You can hide somatic components of spellcasting.

Selective Channeling.benefit: Choose whom to affect with channel energy.

Self-Sufficient.benefit: +2 bonus on Heal and Survival checks.

Sense Assumptions.benefit: Discern which lies would be unbelievable.

Sense Loyalties.benefit: After an hour of interaction, attempt a Sense Motive check to discern a creature’s loyalties.

Sense Relationships.benefit: Discern relationships between two people and use that information against them.

Sense Link.benefit: Gain a +4 bonus on Perception checks when sharing your eidolon’s senses.

prerequisites.Special: patron deity is an evil god

Shadow Druid.benefit: Add selected spells to your druid spell list.

Shadow Gambit.benefit: Cause an ongoing figment you control to deal damage as if it were real.

Shadow Dodge.benefit: Move in and out of shadows to gain a dodge bonus to AC.

Shake it Off.benefit: Gain +1 to all saving throws per adjacent ally.

Shaping Focus.benefit: Count other class levels as druid levels for wild shape purposes.

Shapeshifter Foil.benefit: Hinder a target’s ability to use polymorph effects when you deal damage.

Shapeshifting Hunter.benefit: Add your druid and ranger levels for favored enemy.

prerequisites.Special: ability to acquire an animal companion, eidolon, familiar, or special mount

Share Healing.benefit: Share healing with your companion creature.

prerequisites.Special: ability to acquire an animal companion, eidolon, familiar, or special mount

Share Spells, Improved.benefit: Spells affect both you and your bonded creature.

Shared Insight.benefit: Grant friendly creatures a +2 bonus on Perception checks.

Shared Judgment.benefit: Extend a judgment to an adjacent ally instead of a second judgment.

Shared Soul.benefit: Your phantom protects against death effects, energy drain, and possession.

Shatter Control.benefit: Use channel energy to disrupt the control of undead creatures.

Alternate.Special: ability to cast psychic spells or use psychic spell-like abilities

Shatter Mental Mask.benefit: Offensive manifestations with Will saves reveal an opponent’s true form.

Shatter Resolve.benefit: When a creature damaged by your channel negative energy fails its Will save, it becomes shaken.

Shifter’s Edge.benefit: Add your shifter level to damage with your claws when using Weapon Finesse.

Shifter’s Rush.benefit: Use wild shape as a free action when you charge or move more than 10 feet.

Shocking Amplification.benefit: When you cast a spell with the electricity descriptor that targets one or more creatures, you can take a –1 penalty on the spell’s attack rolls and reduce its saving throw DC by 1 to cause the target closest to you to become fatigued for 1 round.

Shrouded in Mystery.benefit: Against other humanoid races, gain a +2 bonus on Will saves vs. mind-affecting spells and a +3 bonus on Bluff checks.

prerequisites.Special: allegiance to a Hell Knight order

Signifer Armor Training.benefit: As a swift action, reduce your armor’s arcane spell failure chance by 30% for spells cast this round.

Sin Seer.benefit: Gain the ability to detect evil.

Sizzling Shot.benefit: Your bullets ignite when you fire them.

Skald’s Vigor.benefit: Gain fast healing while raging and performing or raging song.

Skeleton Summoner.benefit: Summon skeletons instead of living creatures with summon monster.

Skill Focus.benefit: +3 bonus on one skill (+6 at 10 ranks).

Skilled Driver.benefit: Gain +4 bonus on driving checks with one vehicle.

Expert Driver.benefit: Maneuver a vehicle of a selected type as a move action, and stop immediately.

Skilled Rager.benefit: Select a skill and use it while raging.

Slayer’s Knack.benefit: Double the threat range of all weapons against one favored enemy.

Slow Faller.benefit: Gain or improve the slow fall ability.

Sluggish Jinx.benefit: Your jinx’s penalty on saving throws also applies to the target’s initiative and attack rolls.

Sly Draw.benefit: Make a sleight of hand check instead of Bluff to feint when drawing a light weapon.

Small But Deadly.benefit: Ignore your racial penalty to Strength when calculating damage with natural weapons or trained weapons.

Sneaking Precision.benefit: On the second sneak attack in a round, you may apply a critical feat.

Sneaky Vagabond.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on Stealth checks when others are actively trying to find you; in crowds, this bonus increases to +4.

Sociable.benefit: Grant friendly creatures a +2 bonus on Diplomacy checks.

Sorcerous Bloodstrike.benefit: Regain a bloodline power when you reduce a creature to 0 or fewer hit points.

Spear Dancer.benefit: When you hit with a two-handed reach weapon you have Weapon Focus in, the creature is dazzled for 1 round.

Spectrum Sight.benefit: Perform the read aura occult skill unlock even if you can’t use psychic magic; if you can cast psychic spells or have Psychic Sensitivity, you can use read aura one additional time per day.

Spell Bane.benefit: Your spells’ DCs increase by 2 when bane is in effect.

Spell Bluff.benefit: Bluff other spellcasters, increasing the DC needed to identify your spell.

Spell-Drinker.benefit: The magic that cannot harm you only makes you stronger.

Spell Expertise, Major.benefit: Cast 5th-level or lower spell as spell-like ability 2/day.

Spell Focus.benefit: +1 bonus on save DCs for one school.

Spell Focus, Greater.benefit: +1 bonus on save DCs for one school.

Spell Hex.benefit: Cast a 1st-level spell as a hex.

Spell Mastery.benefit: Prepare some spells without a spellbook.

Spell Penetration.benefit: +2 bonus on level checks to beat spell resistance.

Spell Penetration, Greater.benefit: +2 bonus on level checks to beat spell resistance.

Spell Perfection.benefit: Apply any metamagic feat to one spell without penalty, up to 9th level.

Spell Specialization.benefit: Pick one spell and cast it as if you were higher level.

Spell Specialization, Greater.benefit: Sacrifice a spell to cast your specialized spell.

Spider Step.benefit: Walk on walls or ceilings for half your slow fall distance.

Cloud Step.benefit: Air walk for half your slow fall distance.

Spirit Focus.benefit: Increase spirit bonus from one legend by 1.

Spirit Sense.benefit: +5 on checks to notice haunts, 75% chance to affect incorporeal creatures.

Special: ability to cast speak with dead

Spirit Symbiosis.benefit: When casting speak with dead, you may merge the summoned spirit into your phantom, exchanging its emotional focus for one of your choice for 10 minutes per class level.

Spirit Talker.benefit: Commune with a spirit to gain temporary use of one of its hexes.

prerequisites.Special: Magic jar as a known spell or spell-like ability

Spirit Vision.benefit: When sensing life forces while seeking a host, observe them as you would in your own body. Possession is a standard action.

Spirit Ally.benefit: Gain a close spiritual assistant capable of aiding you in small ways.

Spirit Oni Master.benefit: Bind a spirit oni to your service.

Spirit Ridden.benefit: Invite lesser spirits to share your body in exchange for their training and experience.

prerequisites.Special: animal companion or familiar class feature

Spirit’s Gift.benefit: Commune with a spirit to grant your animal companion or familiar a shaman spirit augmentation.

Spiritual Balance.benefit: Still mind applies against possession; spend ki to double the bonus.

Special: ability to cast spiritual weapon or spiritual ally

Spiritual Guardian.benefit: Increase the attack power of your spirit spells.

Spiritualist’s Call.benefit: Your phantom receives a bonus when summoned.

Splash Weapon Mastery.benefit: Gain several benefits when throwing a splash weapon.

Splintering Weapon.benefit: Break a weapon to deal bleed damage.

Split Hex.benefit: A targeted hex can affect two creatures.

Split Major Hex.benefit: A targeted major hex can affect two creatures.

Spontaneous Metafocus.benefit: Apply metamagic to one spell and keep the standard casting time.

Special: ability to spontaneously cast cure or inflict spells

Spontaneous Nature’s Ally.benefit: Lose a spell slot to spontaneously cast a summon nature’s ally spell of the same level.

Squash Flat.benefit: If your bull rush exceeds the target's CMD by 5, attempt a trip.

Sword Oath.benefit: Select longsword-related feats as if you were a 4th-level fighter.

Sycophant.benefit: Attempt to use Diplomacy to force an enemy to show you mercy.

Talented Magician.benefit: Gain additional uses of spell-like abilities.

Tempting Bargain.benefit: You can select an eidolon of any alignment, but it tempts class feature you to change alignment over time

Taunt.benefit: Demoralize opponents with Bluff instead of Intimidate.

Technologist.benefit: Can use skills with technological subjects.

Technophobe.benefit: Gain a morale bonus when you destroy a robot or technological item.

prerequisites.Special: Have a familiar with the speak with master ability

Telepathic Link.benefit: You and your familiar can communicate with each other telepathically at a range of up to 1 mile.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast detect thoughts or telepathy as a spell, spell-like ability, or telepathy supernatural ability

Tenacious Transmutation.benefit: +2 to DC to dispel your transmutations.

Terrifying Mask.benefit: Anytime you can make a Sense Motive check to get a hunch or detect whether someone is trustworthy or not, you can choose to instead make an Intimidate check at a –2 penalty. This ability only works on creatures of the humanoid type.

Terrifying Strike.benefit: Any creature struck by your slam attack must succeed at a Will save at the same DC as your despair ability or be shaken for 1d4 rounds. If the creature is already shaken, frightened, or panicked, it is paralyzed for 1 round instead. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.

Theurgy.benefit: Augment arcane spells with divine energy and divine spells with arcane energy.

prerequisites.Special: Psychic Sensitivity or ability to cast psychic spells

Third Eye.benefit: Use third eye to read auras and see the truth

Thoughtful Discernment.benefit: Detect lies in a statement you heard, even hours after it has been uttered.

Timely Coordination.benefit: +1 bonus on attack rolls and skill checks for readied actions triggered by allies

Torchbearer.benefit: As Leadership, but you can attract only a 1st-level cohort (referred to hereafter as a torchbearer) with this feat, and can’t recruit followers. You determine your Leadership score according to the rules presented in the Leadership feat, but your torchbearer is always at least 3 levels lower than your level.

Torrid Tolerance.benefit: Treat hot environments as though they were one step less severe; take no penalty on Constitution checks for wearing armor in hot climates

Totem Spirit.benefit: Bonuses depend on which tribe you belong to.

prerequisites.Special: no barbarian totem rage powers except those chosen with this feat; nonlawful alignment

Totemic Initiate.benefit: Gain benefits of a barbarian lesser totem rage power

prerequisites.Special: no barbarian totem rage powers except those chosen with this feat or Totemic Initiate; nonlawful alignment

Totemic Disciple.benefit: Gain benefits of a rage power linked to your chosen totem

prerequisites.Special: no barbarian totem rage powers except those chosen with this feat, Totemic Disciple, or Totemic Initiate; nonlawful alignment

Totemic Master.benefit: Gain benefits of a greater rage power linked to your chosen totem

Touch of Evil.benefit: With a touch, compel other toward evil acts

Toughness.benefit: +3 hit points, +1 per Hit Die beyond 3.

Train Plants.benefit: You treat plant creatures with Int scores of 3 or lower as animals for the purposes of the Handle Animal skill. Plant creatures without an Int score are treated as animals with an Int of 1 for these purposes.

Trapper’s Setup.benefit: Manually trigger traps to gain +2 on attack rolls and to DC.

Tree Leaper.benefit: Count as having a running start when you jump while in a tree

Trepanation.benefit: You can perform the faith healing occult skill unlock even if you can’t use psychic magic. If you can cast psychic spells or have the Psychic Sensitivity feat, you can use faith healing one additional time per day.

Triangulate.benefit: Automatically pinpoint invisible foes and reroll misses due to concealment when you and an ally who has this feat are within 30 feet

prerequisites.Special: Must be a member of a cult of a forgotten pharaoh

Troth of the Forgotten Pharaoh.benefit: Fiery snakes erupt from your body when you die, damaging those around you.

prerequisites.Special: Two subtypes, elf blood or orc blood racial trait

True Breed.benefit: You count as neither of your subtypes for the purposes of effects related to subtype

prerequisites.Special: master disguise master ninja trick or master of disguise advanced rogue talent, ninja level 10th or rogue level 10th

Truth in Wine.benefit: You can perform the psychometry occult skill unlock even if you can’t use psychic magic, though you must consume a drink of high-quality alcohol (costing at least 10 gp per drink) to do so.

Turn Undead.benefit: Channel energy can be used to make undead flee.

Twist Away.benefit: Use Reflex in place of Fortitude as an immediate action.

Umbral Shift.benefit: When in magical darkness, swap places with an ally who also has this feat as a swift action

prerequisites.Special: lay on hands, mercy class feature

Ultimate Mercy.benefit: Expend 10 uses of lay on hands to bring a dead creature back to life.

Ultimate Resolve.benefit: Aura of resolve expands and does not fall when you do.

Uncanny Alertness.benefit: +1 on Perception and Sense Motive checks and a +2 bonus on saving throws against sleep and charm effects.

Uncanny Concentration.benefit: Don’t make concentration checks for violent movement, gain a +2 bonus on all other concentration checks.

Special: worshiper of a god of luck or drink

Unbound Bravery.benefit: You can add the bonus from bravery to Escape Artist checks and combat maneuver checks to escape a grapple. If your bonus from bravery is +2 or higher, then once per day, you can grant that bonus to an ally within 30 feet on a Will save against a fear effect, an Escape Artist check, or a combat maneuver check to escape a grapple. Granting this bonus to an ally is an immediate action and must be declared before the result of your ally’s check is revealed.

Special: worshiper of a god of luck or drink

Undaunted Bravery.benefit: You can add your bonus from bravery to Intimidate checks and to the DC to intimidate you.

prerequisites.Special: ability to cast animate dead or command undead

Undermining Exploit.benefit: Gain +4 insight bonus on combat maneuvers vs. opponents in rocky, difficult terrain.

Unfettered Familiar.benefit: Bestow touch spells on your familiar from a distance.

Unimpeachable Honor.benefit: +4 bonus to avoid violating beliefs, –4 penalty on attack rolls and damage rolls versus allies

Unsanctioned Detection.benefit: Use detect evil to gain bonuses on Perception and Sense Motive checks.

prerequisites.Special: must be able to cast 1st-level paladin spells

Unsanctioned Knowledge.benefit: Add spells to your paladin spell list.

Urban Forager.benefit: You may use the Survival skill to forage and track in urban locations.

prerequisites.Special: Must be in a class that grants a familiar or animal companion

Vampiric Companion.benefit: Your animal companion or familiar’s type changes to “undead.” The creature gains fast healing 5 as well as your vampire or dhampir weaknesses. If you are a vampire, the creature also gains the following abilities, depending on what type of vampire you are.

Vandal.benefit: You can deal sneak attack damage to unattended objects (but half normal damage).

Variant Prayer-Scroll.benefit: You’ve learned how to create variant vampiric prayer scrolls.

Vermin Heart.benefit: Target vermin with spells as if they were animals.

Special: Worship a neutral deity or have neutral alignment and no deity

Versatile Channeler.benefit: Channel both positive and negative energy.

Versatile Jinxer.benefit: The DC of your jinx is based on your choice of Intelligence or Wisdom instead of Charisma.

Vigilant Eidolon.benefit: +4 bonus on Perception checks when your eidolon is within arm’s reach, conscious, and not helpless.

Vigilant Phantom.benefit: +4 on Perception checks within arm’s reach of active phantom

prerequisites.Special: Good standing in an evil organization

Vile Leadership.benefit: You can attract a loyal cohort and a number of cowed followers to assist you in your journeys. This feat is similar to Leadership, except you are rewarded for having a cruel reputation.

Voice of Beasts.benefit: Can speak with animals while in wild shape form.

Voice of the Sibyl.benefit: Gain bonus to Bluff, Diplomacy, and Perform (oratory) checks.

Walking Sleight.benefit: Use Sleight of Hand as a move action or during a move

Wand Dancer.benefit: You can move both before and after triggering a spell trigger item.

War Blessing.benefit: Gain a lesser use of the blessings class feature.

War Singer.benefit: Gain benefits to bardic performance on battlefields and against orcs.

prerequisites.Special: Ability to cast divine spells, domain or mystery class feature

Warrior Priest.benefit: +1 bonus to initiative and +2 on concentration checks when casting defensively.

Waterway Caster.benefit: Automatically succeed at concentration checks while in rough water, and gain a +4 bonus on concentration checks to cast spells underwater

Welcome Pain.benefit: Whenever an ongoing, or repeating, damage effect would reduce you to 0 or fewer hit points, make a Will save to ignore the damage.

Well-Prepared.benefit: Retrieve a specific mundane item from your person.

Wicked Valor.benefit: You regain double the normal amount of hit points with a full night’s rest.

Wild Growth Channel.benefit: Cause grasping vines under your control to grow from the ground

Special: patron (summer, thorns, or woodlands) class feature

Wild Growth Hex.benefit: Cause disruptive thorny plants to grow at the feet of victims of a chosen hex

Wilding.benefit: Gain wild empathy ability or bonus and are treated as an animal for the purpose of harmful mind-affecting effects that target animals

Wilding Mind.benefit: Can take 1d3 Int damage to reroll a failed saving throw versus a fear effect or versus a mind-affecting effect

Wilding Senses.benefit: Gain a +2 bonus on Perception checks (increases to +4 when determining if you can act during a surprise round)

Wild Vigor.benefit: Gain temporary hit points equal to your BAB when you use wild shape

Willing Accomplice.benefit: Use Bluff to aid ally’s Disguise

Witch Knife.benefit: Use dagger as focus for witch patron spells.

Special: Undersized Mount or effective level 7th in the class that grants the mount or divine bond (mount) class feature
mount or divine bond (mount) class feature

Wolf Rider.benefit: Can select wolf as your mount, and Knowledge (nature) is a class skill

Wood Crafter.benefit: Gain +4 bonus on Craft (armor) checks when working with wood, can sometimes craft items at a discount

Word of Healing.benefit: Use lay on hands from a distance.

Worst Case Jinx.benefit: Beneficial variable effects on a jinxed target always result in the minimum possible amount for the effect.

Wrest Charge.benefit: Jury-rig a depleted battery to hold 1 charge.

Xenoglossy.benefit: Use Linguistics to communicate with creatures with which you don’t share a language
